title: Presenting of the Gazette Notifications under the Excise Ordinance (Chapter 52) for approval in Parliament
decision_details:
The proposal made by the  Hon. Prime Minister in his capacity as the Minister of Finance, Economy and Policy Development to present the following Gazette Notifications issued under the Excise Ordinance (Chapter 52) in relevance to several amendments made to duties levied under the Excise Ordinance in Parliament, was approved by the Cabinet.

*	the Excise Notification No.07/2019 published in the Gazette (Extra Ordinary) No.2152/11 dated 2019‑12‑03;

*	the Excise Notification No.08/2019 published in the Gazette (Extra Ordinary) No.2152/12 dated 2019‑12‑03; and

*	the Excise Notification No.09/2019 published in the Gazette (Extra Ordinary) No.2152/13 dated 2019‑12‑03.
